olist_customers_dataset: Table containing information about customers and their locations, with unique identifiers for customers and order delivery locations.
customer_id: Unique identifier assigned to each customer for every order, sample values: 'bb98e27058a8d72162176e336a2b97a2', '8c4946e7875097b10d6f021732685fa2'
customer_unique_id: Unique identifier to identify customers making repurchases at the store, sample values: '22745c06a87ddc1142c22ce98c5bf8d1', '7e04d5e356f71deec4b6275a4b5d1c7e'
customer_zip_code_prefix: Prefix of the zip code for the customer's location, sample values: 17033, 89560
customer_city: City where the customer is located, sample values: 'bauru', 'videira'
customer_state: State where the customer is located, sample values: 'SP', 'SC'
olist_geolocation_dataset: Table with information about Brazilian zip codes, their latitudes and longitudes, cities, and states
geolocation_zip_code_prefix: Brazilian zip code prefix in the dataset, sample values: 8717, 20785
geolocation_lat: Latitude coordinates of the zip codes, sample values: -23.561366266214527, -22.883979070488827
geolocation_lng: Longitude coordinates of the zip codes, sample values: -46.18646183891071, -43.264968177477165
geolocation_city: City corresponding to the zip code, sample values: mogi das cruzes, rio de janeiro
geolocation_state: State corresponding to the zip code, sample values: SP, RJ
olist_order_items_dataset: Table containing data about items purchased within each order from Olist e-commerce platform.
order_id: unique identifier for each order, sample values: 'ead9ba9ae78cb9568101cda32b516dc3', 'db33c2c3cc0b7e95e31b9ea491ece2a9'
order_item_id: identifier for each item within an order, sample values: 1, 2
product_id: unique identifier for each product, sample values: '35afc973633aaeb6b877ff57b2793310', 'a3f39453cb3bacd60e3828f50a2c9c23'
seller_id: identifier for each seller, sample values: '4a3ca9315b744ce9f8e9374361493884', 'e38db885400cd35c71dfd162f2c1dbcf'
shipping_limit_date: date and time limit for shipping, sample values: '2017-12-26 09:33:00', '2018-08-17 04:31:28'
price: price of the item, sample values: 86.9, 64.9
freight_value: cost of shipping, sample values: 14.94, 23.6
olist_order_payments_dataset: Table contains data about orders payment options.
order_id: unique identifier for each order, sample values: '9a5ea74a2fd85889e60e9bdb186cd1f0', 'e72e22dce48aaee824371b8e02641f15'
payment_sequential: sequential payment number for each order, sample values: 1, 2
payment_type: type of payment used for the order, sample values: 'credit_card', 'voucher'
payment_installments: number of installments for the payment, sample values: 2, 12
payment_value: total value of the payment, sample values: 155.23, 1471.51
olist_order_reviews_dataset: Table containing data about customer reviews after purchase made on Olist platform.
review_id: Unique identifier for each review, sample values: '3fbfd473e5cf163d6b29b62521d7e7d4', 'c058842dad4ad2fc1c2e8117350be4e6'
order_id: Unique identifier for each order associated with the review, sample values: '6e8f171a966c53e6442c158fc328eb1a', '41c4425628d692f2d1b59c3c6702429e'
review_score: Numerical rating given by the customer, sample values: 5, 4
review_comment_title: Title of the review comment, sample values: None, None
review_comment_message: Detailed message of the review comment, sample values: 'Melhor sai-te recomendo sempre vou compra aqui', None
review_creation_date: Date and time when the review was created, sample values: '2017-12-27 00:00:00', '2018-03-15 00:00:00'
review_answer_timestamp: Date and time of the Olist response to the review, sample values: '2017-12-28 12:20:27', '2018-03-18 10:15:05'
olist_orders_dataset: Table containing order-level details for Olist e-commerce platform.
order_id: unique identifier for each order, sample values: aa5bc7c80064a78e898a7c2defceb690, ed9f2f1d49ae779e0d1953d6197fbe43
customer_id: unique identifier for each customer, sample values: f2b15f9e51e4e6f10da92a8030b95566, d6e553e33ac0cde8c7073e962a35bb77
order_status: status of the order, sample values: delivered
order_purchase_timestamp: timestamp when the order was purchased, sample values: 2018-01-09 08:29:41, 2017-10-09 12:58:44
order_approved_at: timestamp when the order was approved, sample values: 2018-01-09 08:38:20, 2017-10-10 03:26:59
order_delivered_carrier_date: timestamp when the order was handed to the carrier, sample values: 2018-01-16 01:48:42, 2017-10-10 16:28:06
order_delivered_customer_date: timestamp when the order was delivered to the customer, sample values: 2018-02-09 12:38:58, 2017-10-20 19:33:59
order_estimated_delivery_date: estimated delivery date for the order, sample values: 2018-02-15 00:00:00, 2017-11-22 00:00:00
olist_products_dataset: The table includes data about products sold by Olist, a Brazilian e-commerce platform connecting small businesses to marketplaces.
product_id: unique identifier for each product, sample values: 'b5d70fb85371ee18cb7742bb1f7fb119', '8e1446d14972eb9ba34dd6273315f419'
product_category_name: category name of the product, sample values: 'brinquedos', 'utilidades_domesticas'
product_name_length: length of the product name, sample values: 38.0, 59.0
product_description_length: length of the product description, sample values: 217.0, 1043.0
product_photos_quantity: number of photos for the product, sample values: 1.0, 4.0
product_weight_g: weight of the product in grams, sample values: 400.0, 300.0
product_length_cm: length of the product in centimeters, sample values: 45.0, 16.0
product_height_cm: height of the product in centimeters, sample values: 15.0, 9.0
product_width_cm: width of the product in centimeters, sample values: 35.0, 11.0
olist_sellers_dataset: Data about sellers who fulfilled orders at Olist.
seller_id: unique identifier for each seller, sample values: '59b22a78efb79a4797979612b885db36', '8ab42aa58097fd4668d60cc648225d5f'
seller_zip_code_prefix: first few digits of seller's zip code, sample values: 38414, 74150
seller_city: city where the seller is located, sample values: 'uberlandia', 'goiania'
seller_state: state where the seller is located, sample values: 'MG', 'GO'
product_category_name_translation: Table containing translations of product category names from Portuguese to English.
product_category_name: Portuguese product category name, sample values: sinalizacao_e_seguranca, brinquedos
product_category_name_english: English translated product category name, sample values: signaling_and_security, toys
